feedback: Severely over-snapped wrist disrupts shot consistency.
Moderate wrist snap for consistent follow-through.
Severely low shoulder weakens follow-through, reducing arc.
Elevate shoulder significantly for complete follow-through.
Severely incomplete knee extension causes unstable landing.
Fully extend knees for stable, balanced landing.
Severely bent guide elbow disrupts follow-through balance.
Maintain slight bend in guide elbow for smooth follow-through.
Severely flexed guide wrist disrupts follow-through balance.
Maintain neutral guide wrist for consistent follow-through.
Severely incomplete guide knee extension causes unstable landing.
Fully extend guide knee for balanced landing.
Severely flared elbow disrupts alignment, causing major accuracy loss.
Keep elbow tightly tucked to align with basket.
Severely flexed wrist disrupts grip, causing fumbling.
Reduce wrist flexion significantly for stable grip.
Severely premature hip extension disrupts timing, causing imbalance.
Maintain significant hip bend for balanced transition.
Severely delayed knee extension slows transition, rushing shot.
Extend knees significantly for smoother transition.
Severely bent guide elbow delays shot setup, rushing release.
Extend guide elbow significantly for alignment.
Severely flexed guide wrist causes fumbling, disrupting shot.
Keep guide wrist neutral for stable grip.
Severely premature guide hip extension disrupts balance, affecting rhythm.
Maintain significant guide hip bend for symmetry.
Severely rigid wrist misaligns ball, disrupting setup.
Maintain neutral wrist position to align ball properly.
Severely straight hips create unstable base, drastically reducing power.
Bend hips significantly for a balanced, athletic stance.
Severely straight knees create unstable base, drastically reducing power.
Bend knees significantly for explosive jump and stability.
Severely extended guide elbow pushes ball off-center, disrupting setup.
Bend guide elbow significantly to stabilize ball.
Severely excessive guide hip bend causes major imbalance.
Reduce guide hip bend significantly for better balance.
Severely incomplete extension results in low release, drastically reducing power.
Fully extend elbow at release for maximum power and height.
Severely excessive snap causes erratic release, reducing accuracy.
Moderate wrist snap significantly for controlled release.
Severely low shoulder drastically limits shot height and power.
Elevate shoulder significantly for added power and height.
Severely incomplete knee extension drastically limits shot elevation.
Fully extend knees for maximum shot power.
Severely incomplete guide knee extension reduces stability drastically.
Fully extend guide knee for maximum power and stability.
